classes.cCustomNote: 5 units of Free Electives required. SCM150 workshops for Math/Science courses recommended for remaining units.
5 units of Free Electives required. SCM150 workshops for Math/Science courses recommended for remaining units.
5 Units of Free Electives required. SCM150 workshops for Math/Science courses recommended for remaining units.
Choose one of the following: BIO327, BIO363, BIO442; BOT326; MCRO436; MSCI300.
Choose one of the following: BIO361, BIO434, BIO435.

One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, C1, C2, C3, C4, C1-C5 elective, D1, D2, D3, D4, D5, and F. C4, D5, and F should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to online catalog for GE course selection, United States Cultural Pluralism (USCP) and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR). USCP requirement can be satisfied by some (but not all) courses within GE categories: C3, C4, C1, D3, D4, D5, or F.

10 units of Advanced Cell & Molecular Applications required. Select from the following: ASCI403; BIO405, BIO426, BIO428; BIO/CHEM 411, BIO/CHEM 476; CHEM372, CHEM418, CHEM474; MCRO402, MCRO433. Consultation with advisor is recommended. Excess units will be applied to Additional Electives requirement.
